result.eng: I don't remember all the details of the story but I do remember that he told it beautifully.
result.ga: Ní cuimhin liom gach pioc den scéal ach is cuimhin liom gur inis sé go hálainn é
result.orig: Ní cuimhin liom gach pioc den scéal ach is cuimhin liom gur inis sé go hálainn é
result.html: Ní cuimhin liom gach pioc den scéal ach is cuimhin liom gur inis sé go hálainn éI don't remember all the details of the story but I do remember that he told it beautifully.
result.ponchtml: Ní cuiṁin liom gaċ pioc den scéal aċ is cuiṁin liom gur inis sé go hálainn éI don't remember all the details of the story but I do remember that he told it beautifully.
